xtce:AbsoluteTimeParameterType.name: POSIXTimeType
xtce:AbsoluteTimeParameterType.shortDescription: POSIX UNIX Time 'timeval' which is 2 unsigned 32 bit integers

xtce:IntegerParameterType.name: CCSDS_Packet_Length_Type
xtce:IntegerParameterType.xtce:LongDescription: The packet length field specifies the number of octets contained within the packet data field. The number shall be an unsigned integer “C” where C = (Number of octets in packet data field) minus 1. NOTE The actual length of the entire telemetry source packet, including the source packet header, is 6 octets longer.

xtce:IntegerArgumentType.name: CCSDS_Packet_Length_Type
xtce:IntegerArgumentType.xtce:LongDescription: The packet length field specifies the number of octets contained within the packet data field. The number shall be an unsigned integer “C” where C = (Number of octets in packet data field) minus 1. NOTE The actual length of the entire telemetry source packet, including the source packet header, is 6 octets longer.

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: PUS_1_1
xtce:SequenceContainer.shortDescription: Marks that a TC has been succesfully received

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: PUS_1_2
xtce:SequenceContainer.shortDescription: Marks that a TC has not been succesfully received

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: PUS_1_3
xtce:SequenceContainer.shortDescription: Marks that the execution of a TC has been successfully started

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: PUS_1_4
xtce:SequenceContainer.shortDescription: Marks that the execution of a TC has not been successfully started

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: PUS_1_5
xtce:SequenceContainer.shortDescription: Marks that the execution of a TC is being succesful

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: PUS_1_6
xtce:SequenceContainer.shortDescription: Marks that the execution of a TC has been interrupted by a problem

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: PUS_1_7
xtce:SequenceContainer.shortDescription: Marks that the execution of a TC has been completed successfully

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: PUS_1_8
xtce:SequenceContainer.shortDescription: Marks that the execution of a TC has not been completed successfully

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: PUS_1_10
xtce:SequenceContainer.shortDescription: Marks that a problem has happened during the enrouting of a TC

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: PUS_3_35
xtce:SequenceContainer.shortDescription: Shows information about how often the HK is being recollected right now

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: PUS_4_2
xtce:SequenceContainer.shortDescription: Shows stadistical information about a certain number of parameters

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: PUS_5_1
xtce:SequenceContainer.shortDescription: Marks that a informative event has happened and shows the usefull information about it

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: PUS_5_2
xtce:SequenceContainer.shortDescription: Marks that a low severity anomaly has happened and shows the usefull information about it

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: PUS_5_3
xtce:SequenceContainer.shortDescription: Marks that a medium severity anomaly has happened and shows the usefull information about it

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: PUS_5_4
xtce:SequenceContainer.shortDescription: Marks that a high severity anomaly has happened and shows the usefull information about it

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: PUS_5_8
xtce:SequenceContainer.shortDescription: Shows which events has been disabled

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: PUS_9_3
xtce:SequenceContainer.shortDescription: Shows the S/C time

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: PUS_17_2
xtce:SequenceContainer.shortDescription: Marks that the are-you-alive test has been completed successfully

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: PUS_20_2
xtce:SequenceContainer.shortDescription: Shows the values of a certain number of parameters which are marked by their ID

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: PUS_21_7
xtce:SequenceContainer.shortDescription: Shows the status of the diferent request sequences that have been send to the S/C

xtce:SequenceContainer.name: PUS_21_14
xtce:SequenceContainer.shortDescription: Shows which request sequences has been interrupted

xtce:MetaCommand.name: PUS_3_31
xtce:MetaCommand.shortDescription: Change the collection interval of a certain number of HK parameters

xtce:MetaCommand.name: PUS_3_33
xtce:MetaCommand.shortDescription: Ask the information about the collection interval of a certain number of HK parameters

xtce:MetaCommand.name: PUS_4_1
xtce:MetaCommand.shortDescription: Ask the stadistical information of all the HK

xtce:MetaCommand.name: PUS_4_3
xtce:MetaCommand.shortDescription: Ask to reset all the data that is used to make the stadistical information of the HK

xtce:MetaCommand.name: PUS_4_4
xtce:MetaCommand.shortDescription: Ask the S/C to send his stadistical information every time that a certain interval pass

xtce:MetaCommand.name: PUS_4_5
xtce:MetaCommand.shortDescription: Stop the periodical generation of stadisticals reports

xtce:MetaCommand.name: PUS_5_5
xtce:MetaCommand.shortDescription: Enable the generation of a certain number of event reports that has been disabled

xtce:MetaCommand.name: PUS_5_6
xtce:MetaCommand.shortDescription: Disable the generation of a certain number of event reports

xtce:MetaCommand.name: PUS_5_7
xtce:MetaCommand.shortDescription: Ask a list of all the event reports that have been disabled

xtce:MetaCommand.name: PUS_8_1
xtce:MetaCommand.shortDescription: This TC is used to use our defined functions

xtce:MetaCommand.name: PUS_17_1
xtce:MetaCommand.shortDescription: Starts the are-you-alive test with the S/C

xtce:MetaCommand.name: PUS_20_1
xtce:MetaCommand.shortDescription: Ask the values of a certain number of parameters

xtce:MetaCommand.name: PUS_20_3
xtce:MetaCommand.shortDescription: Change the value of a certain number of parameters of the S/C

xtce:MetaCommand.name: PUS_21_1_Base
xtce:MetaCommand.shortDescription: Send a certain number of TCs considering a delay in his execution. This delay starts at the moment of reception of the S/C of the TC

xtce:MetaCommand.name: PUS_21_1_PAY_Calibration_First
xtce:MetaCommand.shortDescription: PUS[24,1] in the case of the first part of the Payload calibration

xtce:MetaCommand.name: PUS_21_1_PAY_Calibration_Second
xtce:MetaCommand.shortDescription: PUS[24,1] in the case of the second part of the Payload calibration

xtce:MetaCommand.name: PUS_24_1
xtce:MetaCommand.shortDescription: Enables the colection of information of a parameter

xtce:MetaCommand.name: PUS_24_2
xtce:MetaCommand.shortDescription: Disables the colection of information of a parameter

xtce:SpaceSystem.name: EVENTS
xtce:SpaceSystem.shortDescription: Variables used in YAMCS for scripts

xtce:Parameter.name: Beacon_Check
xtce:Parameter.shortDescription: True = Beacon Check Done, False = Beacon Check not Done

xtce:SpaceSystem.name: Beacons
xtce:SpaceSystem.shortDescription: Variables and structure of the beacons
